Item 2.02 Results of Operations and Financial
Condition.

On April 16, 2021, The PNC Financial Services
Group, Inc. (“the Corporation”) issued a press
release regarding the Corporation’s earnings
and business results for the first quarter of
2021. A copy of the Corporation’s press
release is included in this Report as Exhibit
99.1 and is furnished herewith.
